verses.verse: "Now this<WH2088> is what<WH1697> <WH834> you shall do<WH6213> to them to consecrate<WH6942> them to minister<WH3547> as priests<WH3547> to Me: take<WH3947> one<WH259> young<WH1121> bull<WH6499> and two<WH8147> rams<WH352> without<WH8549> blemish,<WH8549>

and unleavened<WH4682> bread<WH3899> and unleavened<WH4682> cakes<WH2471> mixed<WH1101> with oil,<WH8081> and unleavened<WH4682> wafers<WH7550> spread<WH4886> with oil;<WH8081> you shall make<WH6213> them of fine<WH5560> wheat<WH2406> flour.<WH5560>
"And you shall put<WH5414> them in one<WH259> basket,<WH5536> and present<WH7126> them in the basket<WH5536> along with the bull<WH6499> and the two<WH8147> rams.<WH352>
"Then you shall bring<WH7126> Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> to the doorway<WH6607> of the tent<WH168> of meeting,<WH4150> and wash<WH7364> them with water.<WH4325>

"And you shall take<WH3947> the garments,<WH899> and put<WH3847> on Aaron<WH175> the tunic<WH3801> and the robe<WH4598> of the ephod<WH646> and the ephod<WH646> and the breastpiece,<WH2833> and gird<WH640> him with the skillfully<WH2805> woven<WH2805> band<WH2805> of the ephod;<WH646>
and you shall set<WH7660> the turban<WH4701> on his head,<WH7218> and put<WH5414> the holy<WH6944> crown<WH5145> on the turban.<WH4701>
"Then you shall take<WH3947> the anointing<WH4888> oil,<WH8081> and pour<WH3332> it on his head<WH7218> and anoint<WH4886> him.
"And you shall bring<WH7126> his sons<WH1121> and put<WH3847> tunics<WH3801> on them.

"And you shall gird<WH2296> them with sashes,<WH73> Aaron<WH175> and his sons,<WH1121> and bind<WH2280> caps<WH4021> on them, and they shall have<WH1961> the priesthood<WH3550> by a perpetual<WH5769> statute.<WH2708> So you shall ordain<WH4390> <WH3027> Aaron<WH175> and his sons.<WH1121>

"Then you shall bring<WH7126> the bull<WH6499> before<WH6440> the tent<WH168> of meeting,<WH4150> and Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> shall lay<WH5564> their hands<WH3027> on the head<WH7218> of the bull.<WH6499>
"And you shall slaughter<WH7819> the bull<WH6499> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> at the doorway<WH6607> of the tent<WH168> of meeting.<WH4150>

"And you shall take<WH3947> some<WH4480> of the blood<WH1818> of the bull<WH6499> and put<WH5414> [it] on the horns<WH7161> of the altar<WH4196> with your finger;<WH676> and you shall pour<WH8210> out all<WH3605> the blood<WH1818> at the base<WH3247> of the altar.<WH4196>

"And you shall take<WH3947> all<WH3605> the fat<WH2459> that covers<WH3680> the entrails<WH7130> and the lobe<WH3508> of the liver,<WH3516> and the two<WH8147> kidneys<WH3629> and the fat<WH2459> that is on them, and offer<WH6999> them up in smoke<WH6999> on the altar.<WH4196>

"But the flesh<WH1320> of the bull<WH6499> and its hide<WH5785> and its refuse,<WH6569> you shall burn<WH8313> with fire<WH784> outside<WH4480> <WH2351> the camp;<WH4264> it is a sin<WH9128> offering.<WH9128>
"You shall also take<WH3947> the one<WH259> ram,<WH352> and Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> shall lay<WH5564> their hands<WH3027> on the head<WH7218> of the ram;<WH352>
and you shall slaughter<WH7819> the ram<WH352> and shall take<WH3947> its blood<WH1818> and sprinkle<WH2236> it around<WH5439> on the altar.<WH4196>
"Then you shall cut<WH5408> the ram<WH352> into its pieces,<WH5409> and wash<WH7364> its entrails<WH7130> and its legs,<WH3767> and put<WH5414> [them] with its pieces<WH5409> and its head.<WH7218>

"And you shall offer<WH6999> up in smoke<WH6999> the whole<WH3605> ram<WH352> on the altar;<WH4196> it is a burnt<WH5930> offering<WH5930> to the Lord:<WH3068> it is a soothing<WH5207> aroma,<WH7381> an offering<WH801> by fire<WH801> to the Lord.<WH3068>
"Then you shall take<WH3947> the other<WH8145> ram,<WH352> and Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> shall lay<WH5564> their hands<WH3027> on the head<WH7218> of the ram.<WH352>

"And you shall slaughter<WH7819> the ram,<WH352> and take<WH3947> some<WH4480> of its blood<WH1818> and put<WH5414> [it] on the lobe<WH8571> of Aaron's right ear<WH241> and on the lobes<WH8571> of his sons' right<WH3233> ears<WH241> and on the thumbs<WH931> of their right<WH3233> hands<WH3027> and on the big<WH931> toes<WH931> of their right<WH3233> feet,<WH7272> and sprinkle<WH2236> the [rest of the] blood<WH1818> around<WH5439> on the altar.<WH4196>

"Then you shall take<WH3947> some<WH4480> of the blood<WH1818> that is on the altar<WH4196> and some<WH4480> of the anointing<WH4888> oil,<WH8081> and sprinkle<WH5137> [it] on Aaron<WH175> and on his garments,<WH899> and on his sons<WH1121> and on his sons<WH1121>' garments<WH899> with him; so he and his garments<WH899> shall be consecrated,<WH6942> as well as his sons and his sons' garments<WH899> with him.

"You shall also take<WH3947> the fat<WH2459> from the ram<WH352> and the fat<WH451> tail,<WH451> and the fat<WH2459> that covers<WH3680> the entrails<WH7130> and the lobe<WH3508> of the liver,<WH3516> and the two<WH8147> kidneys<WH3629> and the fat<WH2459> that is on them and the right<WH3225> thigh<WH7785> (for it is a ram<WH352> of ordination<WH4394>),

and one<WH259> cake<WH3603> of bread<WH3899> and one<WH259> cake<WH2471> of bread<WH3899> [mixed with] oil<WH8081> and one<WH259> wafer<WH7550> from the basket<WH5536> of unleavened<WH4682> bread<WH4682> which<WH834> is [set] before<WH6440> the Lord;<WH3068>

and you shall put<WH7760> all<WH3605> these<WH3605> in the hands<WH3709> of Aaron<WH175> and in the hands<WH3709> of his sons,<WH1121> and shall wave<WH5130> them as a wave<WH8573> offering<WH8573> before<WH6440> the Lord.<WH3068>

"And you shall take<WH3947> them from their hands,<WH3027> and offer<WH6999> them up in smoke<WH6999> on the altar<WH4196> on the burnt<WH5930> offering<WH5930> for a soothing<WH5207> aroma<WH7381> before<WH6440> the Lord;<WH3068> it is an offering<WH801> by fire<WH801> to the Lord.<WH3068>

"Then you shall take<WH3947> the breast<WH2373> of Aaron's ram<WH352> of ordination,<WH4394> and wave<WH5130> it as a wave<WH8573> offering<WH8573> before<WH6440> the Lord;<WH3068> and it shall be your portion.<WH4490>

"And you shall consecrate<WH6942> the breast<WH2373> of the wave<WH8573> offering<WH8573> and the thigh<WH7785> of the heave<WH8641> offering<WH8641> which<WH834> was waved<WH5130> and which<WH834> was offered<WH7311> from the ram<WH352> of ordination,<WH4394> from the one which<WH834> was for Aaron<WH175> and from the one which<WH834> was for his sons.<WH1121>

"And it shall be for Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> as [their] portion<WH2706> forever<WH5769> from the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> for it is a heave<WH8641> offering;<WH8641> and it shall be a heave<WH8641> offering<WH8641> from the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> from the sacrifices<WH2077> of their peace<WH8002> offerings,<WH8002> [even] their heave<WH8641> offering<WH8641> to the Lord.<WH3068>
"And the holy<WH6944> garments<WH899> of Aaron<WH175> shall be for his sons<WH1121> after<WH310> him, that in them they may be anointed<WH4886> and ordained.<WH4390> <WH3027>

"For seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> the one of his sons<WH1121> who is priest<WH3548> in his stead<WH8478> shall put<WH3847> them on when<WH834> he enters<WH935> the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> to minister<WH8334> in the holy<WH6944> place.
"And you shall take<WH3947> the ram<WH352> of ordination<WH4394> and boil<WH1310> its flesh<WH1320> in a holy<WH6918> place.<WH4725>

"And Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> shall eat<WH398> the flesh<WH1320> of the ram,<WH352> and the bread<WH3899> that is in the basket,<WH5536> at the doorway<WH6607> of the tent<WH168> of meeting.<WH4150>

"Thus they shall eat<WH398> those things by which<WH834> atonement<WH3722> was made<WH3722> at their ordination<WH4390> <WH3027> [and] consecration;<WH6942> but a layman<WH2114> shall not eat<WH398> [them,] because<WH3588> they are holy.<WH6944>

"And if<WH518> any<WH4480> of the flesh<WH1320> of ordination<WH4394> or any<WH4480> of the bread<WH3899> remains<WH3498> until<WH5704> morning,<WH1242> then you shall burn<WH8313> the remainder<WH3498> with fire;<WH784> it shall not be eaten,<WH398> because<WH3588> it is holy.<WH6944>

"And thus<WH3602> you shall do<WH6213> to Aaron<WH175> and to his sons,<WH1121> according to all<WH3605> that I have commanded<WH6680> you; you shall ordain<WH4390> <WH3027> them through seven<WH7651> days.<WH3117>

"And each day<WH3117> you shall offer<WH6213> a bull<WH6499> as a sin<WH9128> offering<WH9128> for atonement,<WH3725> and you shall purify<WH2398> the altar<WH4196> when you make<WH3722> atonement<WH3722> for it; and you shall anoint<WH4886> it to consecrate<WH6942> it.

"For seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> you shall make<WH3722> atonement<WH3722> for the altar<WH4196> and consecrate<WH6942> it; then the altar<WH4196> shall be most<WH6944> holy,<WH6944> [and] whatever<WH3605> touches<WH5060> the altar<WH4196> shall be holy.<WH6942>
"Now this<WH2088> is what<WH834> you shall offer<WH6213> on the altar:<WH4196> two<WH8147> one year<WH8141> old<WH1121> lambs<WH3532> each day,<WH3117> continuously.<WH8548>
"The one<WH259> lamb<WH3532> you shall offer<WH6213> in the morning,<WH1242> and the other<WH8145> lamb<WH3532> you shall offer<WH6213> at twilight;<WH6153>

and there [shall be] one-tenth<WH259> [of an ephah] of fine<WH5560> flour<WH5560> mixed<WH1101> with one-fourth of a hin<WH1969> of beaten<WH3795> oil,<WH8081> and one-fourth of a hin<WH1969> of wine<WH3196> for a libation<WH5262> with one lamb.<WH3532>

"And the other<WH8145> lamb<WH3532> you shall offer<WH6213> at twilight,<WH6153> and shall offer<WH6213> with it the same grain offering<WH4503> as the morning<WH1242> and the same libation,<WH5262> for a soothing<WH5207> aroma,<WH7381> an offering<WH801> by fire<WH801> to the Lord.<WH3068>

"It shall be a continual<WH8548> burnt<WH5930> offering<WH5930> throughout your generations<WH1755> at the doorway<WH6607> of the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> before<WH6440> the Lord,<WH3068> where<WH834> <WH8033> I will meet<WH3259> with you, to speak<WH1696> to you there.<WH8033>
"And I will meet<WH3259> there<WH8033> with the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and it shall be consecrated<WH6942> by My glory.<WH9202>
"And I will consecrate<WH6942> the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> and the altar;<WH4196> I will also consecrate<WH6942> Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> to minister<WH3547> as priests<WH3547> to Me.
"And I will dwell<WH7931> among<WH8432> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> and will be their God.<WH430>

"And they shall know<WH3045> that I am the Lord<WH3068> their God<WH430> who<WH834> brought<WH3318> them out of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> that I might dwell<WH7931> among<WH8432> them; I am the Lord<WH3068> their God.<WH430>
